archetypedescription.p: Mithras Invictus is the most popular god in Westernreich and the Church of Mithras is by far the largest and most dominate religious body in the largest and most powerful empire of man. The Confessor Militarum is the primary military order within the church responsible for the protection of the people and projection of the Churchs political and military might throughout the Empire and beyond.

Members of the Confessor Militarum are full priests of Mithras and are therefore subject to the Sanguis Dictat that states that its members are forbidden to cause blood to flow. In practice, adherence to this dictat is considered to be honoured if the brother-confessor does not use edged weapons, weapons tagged as Asanguineous comply.
